description:
This proof documents a morning farm preparation activity at MaMeeFarm on
22 December 2025 at 07:19 AM (GMT+7).

The image shows onion bulbs prepared and placed on a freshly worked vegetable bed, following land preparation completed the previous day. This step represents the transition from soil preparation to active planting, marking continuity in small-scale crop production.

The onions are arranged manually on dry, loosened soil, reflecting traditional, low-input farming practices without mechanized equipment. The activity demonstrates real-world constraints, human labor, and incremental progress typical of subsistence and smallholder agriculture.

This record is captured as-is, without staging or enhancement, in alignment with DGCP principles of ground-truth evidence, temporal continuity, and transparency.
The timestamp embedded in the image provides verifiable temporal context and preserves the integrity of MaMeeFarmâ€™s daily operational archive.

This proof is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
